itunes:title: JUN 02 2022 - RECEIPTS ON EVERY WOKE COMPANY'S HISTORY IN 1930S GERMANY
title: JUN 02 2022 - RECEIPTS ON EVERY WOKE COMPANY'S HISTORY IN 1930S GERMANY
description:
With Pride Month taking off, Jack Posobiec exposes woke companies’ hypocritical product lines in 1930s Germany and compares their pandering techniques between the U.S. market and the Saudi market. Jack Posobiec analyzes a recent report claiming that election voting machines used in 16 states are vulnerable to cyber hacking, leading to severe consequences. California Governor Gavin Newsom’s panel is set to release a report calling for comprehensive reparations for black Americans which include expanded voter registration, more accountability for police brutality, and the creation of a special government office to approve reparation payments. Finally, the jury rules in favor of Johnny Depp in the defamation lawsuit against Amber Heard. Could this be the end of the ‘Me Too Movement’?



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


To get $150 off each 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ go to PrepareWithPOSO.com and use promo code POSO
